"Christmas music!":
"I am performing the bells during Christmas!
The sound of the bell ringing during the night is.
ah, beautiful.
As expected, if we mention about Christmas, the
sound of the bell is something we need
With that, please procure the bell today!
It seems that the Rappy, which only appears during
this season, will bring along the golden yellow bell
which produces such wonderful sounds.
*Saint Rappy drops"

"クリスマスに鈴の演奏をすることにしたよ！
夜に鳴り響く鈴の音……はぁ、素敵よねぇ。
やっぱりクリスマスといえば鈴の音は
欠かせないと思うの。
それで今日は鈴の調達のお願い！
この季節にだけ出没するラッピーが
素敵な音を響かせる黄金色の鈴を
持っているらしいのよ。
※セント・ラッピーがドロップ"
